name: Glow (itch) (AprilMartin)
description:
A 2D platformer that emphasizes exploration and resource management.

Find your way through a pitch-black world, guided by the dim light that your phosphorescent character emits. Spit glowing goo to illuminate distant areas, or damage your foes - but be careful! Running out of goo leaves you at the mercy of both enemies and the darkness.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game is a student project, made over the course of one semester at the University of Utah by three developers. It's a small game, but we hope it brightens your day!
